items.content_html: Last weekend, we drove down the scenic Peak-to-Peak Highway to take in the fall scenery. We even saw a moose!
items.content_text: Last weekend, we drove down the scenic Peak-to-Peak Highway to take in the fall scenery. We even saw a moose!

items.content_html: Taken today at the Lost Gulch Overlook near Boulder.
items.content_text: Taken today at the [Lost Gulch Overlook](https://bouldercolorado.gov/trailhead/lost-gulch-overlook) near Boulder.

items.content_html: Moving my site from Squarespace to Micro.blog. After reading through Indie Microblogging, I decided that supporting indie software development and owning my content was the best of both worlds.
items.content_text: Moving my site from Squarespace to Micro.blog. After reading through [Indie Microblogging](https://book.micro.blog), I decided that supporting indie software development and owning my content was the best of both worlds.
